## WithCLI interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface WithCLI
```

## Methods

-   [cli(argv)](./web.withcli.cli.md)Starts a PHP CLI session with given arguments.
    Can only be used when PHP was compiled with the CLI SAPI.
    Cannot be used in conjunction with `run()`<!-- -->.
